docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Notice

Due to resource limitations, this app is temporarily out of service. However, we plan to bring it back soon.

Please check back later. Thank you.

docs.title: molbuilder
docs.text: A web-based application to generate atomic configuration for atomistic simulations.

docs.title: Support this project
docs.text: We use our expertise and skills to contribute to free codes for computational materials and building molecular models to be used in atomic simulations. This project aims at mitigating the challenges of modeling faced by individuals seeking to conduct computational studies at atomic scales. Sustaining such a service incurs costs, and even the smallest donation would be greatly appreciated.

docs.title: Make a request
docs.text: To discuss anything else, please contact us at this email.

docs.title: Maintain notice
docs.text: NOTICE: This app is now under maintenance time. Please check back later.

docs.title: molbuilder
docs.text: An online app to generate models for atomistic simulations.
